means: 无精打采地立、坐或行走( slouch的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Poor posture, sitting or walking slouched over, compresses the body's organs.
sentence.Network_cn: 坐着或者走路的时候低头垂肩，这种不正确的姿势会压迫体内的器官。
这个小家伙愁眉苦脸，一副垂头丧气的样子。

sentence.Network_en: The men were slouched on sofas and chairs.
sentence.Network_cn: 男人们无精打采地坐在沙发和椅子上。

PerfectNetExp.abs: also , studies have shown that just one hour sitting in a slouched position can strain ligaments in the back which can take months to heal .研究表明低头垂肩的姿势坐着可拉伸背部韧带，几个月可治愈。
A girl slouched in front of her ., 她前头有一个姑娘 , 没精打采地走着.

list.abs: with a slouching gait or posture ., 以没精打采的步态或者姿势.
slouching posture looks tired and uncaring ., 懒散的姿势显得疲惫和漫不经心.
slotware 槽件slouch hat 宽边软帽slouch 懒散
he is no slouch at tennis ., 他网球打得不错.

entry.tran: 无精打采地坐着(或站着)
entry.def: If someone slouches, they sit or stand with their shoulders and head bent so they look lazy and unattractive.

example.ex: Try not to slouch when you are sitting down...
example.tran: 坐的时候尽量不要无精打采的。

example.ex: She has recently begun to slouch over her typewriter.
example.tran: 最近，她坐在打字机前就开始变得无精打采的。

entry.tran: 无精打采地走;懒洋洋地走
entry.def: If someone slouches somewhere, they walk around slowly with their shoulders and head bent looking lazy or bored.

example.ex: Most of the time, they slouch around in the fields...
example.tran: 他们绝大多数时间都无精打采地走在田间。
这个小家伙愁眉苦脸，一副垂头丧气的样子。

entry.tran: 擅长;愿意卖力工作;手脚勤快麻利
entry.def: If you say that someone is no slouch at a particular activity, you mean that they are skilful at it or are willing to work hard at it.

example.ex: The Welsh are no slouches at cooking.
example.tran: 威尔士人在烹饪方面可是好手。

auth_sentence.content: The buildings have slouched, peeled, gone to seed.
auth_sentence.res_content: The buildings have slouched, peeled, gone to seed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The buildings have slouched, peeled, gone to seed.

auth_sentence.content: She slouched in the back while the driver got out.
auth_sentence.res_content: She slouched in the back while the driver got out.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She slouched in the back while the driver got out.

auth_sentence.content: I glanced over at Ledbetter, slouched uneasily against the doorframe.
auth_sentence.res_content: I glanced over at Ledbetter, slouched uneasily against the doorframe.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I glanced over at Ledbetter, slouched uneasily against the doorframe.
